text: 7:5 Godɨn Araziba 12:3Ia gumazamizir kaba ko poghan markɨ. Bar markɨ. Ia kamaghɨn damu. Ia me ofabar amuasa tuer biziba, ko men ofa gamir dakoziba apɨrarigh, men dagɨar guarir dɨghoriba itiba bar da mɨsararɨkigh. Egh temer guarir aser amizim Aseran nedazim itiba okɨva marvir guabar apongtɨ da isi.
